item.title: i-Magination Software Bhd
item.description: Software Engineer July 2005 â€“ July 2006 Cyberjaya, Malaysia Optical Character Recognition (OCR) I was part of the core team which worked on building the next version of the Document Management System from scratch. OCR was a very interesting module I helped developed which involved quite a bit of algorithm and, it has to support fuzzy search & language processing.
